title: Smoked Salmon Pate
ingredients: ['225g cream cheese, softened', '50g smoked salmon, flaked or chopped', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1/4 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon fish seasoning', '1 dash ground black pepper']
